scripts.start: npm run analyze > resume-analyzed && npm run to-jrs && npm run generate-all && mkdir -p dist && cp out/resume.html dist/index.html
scripts.generate-all: hackmyresume BUILD resume.json TO out/resume.all -t $(awk -F "=" '/all-theme/ {print $2}' config)
scripts.generate-html: hackmyresume BUILD resume.json TO out/resume.html -t $(awk -F "=" '/html-theme/ {print $2}' config)  && mkdir -p dist && cp out/resume.html dist/index.html
scripts.generate-pdf: hackmyresume BUILD resume.json TO out/resume.pdf -t $(awk -F "=" '/pdf-theme/ {print $2}' config)
scripts.deploy: gh-pages -d dist -m 'Pushed gh-pages' && npm run jsonresume-publish
scripts.full: npm start && npm run generate-html && npm run deploy
